favourite.article: I once was DEAD—dead in my sins... But GOD being so merciful... But that’s not all! I’m with the SAINTS!... Now in Christ He has become my PEACE; By the blood of Christ I am RELEASED... With all saints together, let us stand, SHOUT and SING and PRAISE the LORD! HALLELUJAH!!!

Lord, we no longer want to be dead! We need You as our life!
I enjoyed the last stanza:
He has died creating one new man. Thus fulfilling God's eternal plan. With all saints together let us stand, Shout and sing and praise the Lord!
I LOVE THIS SONG! THE TUNE IS WONDERFUL AND THE LYRICS ARE SOOOOOO FULL OF LIFE! PRAISE THE LORD FOR THIS SONG!
